name: In The Hole (Kill Idol)
description:
Light the Way!

Young Thyme, has fallen into a hole in the ground, finding themselves surrounded by darkness in a strange dungeon. A mysterious entity allows them to borrow a magical lantern filled with fireflies to help them navigate the dark halls, and defend against the angry spritits.

Can Thyme make it out of the dungeon alive,?  At what cost?

'In The Hole' is a short "arcade" dungeon crawler, made in RPG Maker MV. The character/battle sprites, music and illustrations were made by me!

Special thanks also goes to these fine folks for their plugins:

  • SumRndmDde
  • Yanfly
  • FogoMax
  • Hime(Himeworks)
